bibl.title: Egyptian Amphorae LR 5/6 with Greek Dipinti found in Dongola.
Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday.

bibl.note: The dipinti painted on amphorae produced in the northwestern part of the Nile Delta cast light on the organization of Egyptian wine exports to Makuria in the 7th century. - Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.seg: Katarzyna Danys & Adam Łajtar, Egyptian Amphorae LR 5/6 with Greek Dipinti found in Dongola.
A. Łajtar, A. Obłuski & I. Zych (edd.), Aegyptus et Nubia Christiana. The Włodzimierz Godlewski Jubilee Volume on the Occasion of his 70th Birthday (Warsaw, 2016) pp. 347-357, 2 figg.
The dipinti painted on amphorae produced in the northwestern part of the Nile Delta cast light on the organization of Egyptian wine exports to Makuria in the 7th century. - Avec résumé en anglais.
